description.title: PRODUCT STORY
description.text: Inspired by PUMA’s Icons of Speed, the Spirex is a new progressive runner made for bold streetwear choices. Its design synthesizes various performance archive elements to form a fresher Futro DNA. The outsole draws inspiration from runners’ spikes, while the upper is a reinterpretation of PUMA’s soccer and motorsport heritage. This premium execution features a textile base and 5D print Formstrip along with nubuck overlays which convey the premium focus of this one of a kind shoe.

list.item-1: The upper of the shoes is made with at least 20% recycled materials

list.item-5: Medial mesh panel with geometric 5D print
list.item-6: TPU inserts in top eyestay and heel
